website_summaries.verdict: Specially designed to reduce pressure on the joints, this orthopedic dog bed is a good choice for furry friends who need a little extra support.
pros: Crafted from quality memory foam to the same standards as premium orthopedic mattresses designed for people
Conforms to your dog’s shape to reduce pressure on the joints
Soft velour cover is 100% waterproof and removable for cleaning
cons: It has a slight chemical smell upon opening and needs to be aired

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed!
customer_reviews.text: My Lab LOVES this bed! She is about 85lb, 2ft tall, and 3ft long so this bed gives her PLENTY of room to lay down or sprawl out. It is true to both size and color to a T. It raised to 4in within 1/2 hour of unpacking it. I love that the cover unzips so that it can easily be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bed
customer_reviews.text: I have a beagle mix who is around 22 pounds and I think the small sized bed is just the right fit for her. I was a little scared it would be too small when I took it out of the box. It comes compressed and says to allow 24-48 hours for it to decompress, but I would say it was at its full size in a matter of hours. I didn't notice any weird smells, and Calla seems to like it! We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: IHJB

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend it. He is a 76 pound Pointer/Great Dane/Cattle ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this mat. His crate is by my computer and when I am working he chooses to come lay on it even though there's a couch he's welcome to right by it as well. I have washed the cover multiple times and it's still soft and maintaining well. I would definitely recommend it. He is a 76 pound Pointer/Great Dane/Cattle Dog mix :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Bed expanded to full size in a matter of minutes, my dog was curled up on it in the same amount of time. Looks to be good, will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Since my bulldog Roscoe sleeps 90% of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Since my bulldog Roscoe sleeps 90% of the day, he's lov'in it!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shettle

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD BUY. One of the best pet beds I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: Purchased this for a dog with arthritis. The bed looks good and is comfortable. Pros: 1) Good quality memory foam. 2) Water resistant, not waterproof. 3) Comfortable. 4) Nice looking. 5) Good price. 6) Zippered cover. 7) Memory foam is dense. Cons: 1) Short dog fur can get caught in the microfiber topping. 2) The foam can be ripped apart by strong dogs (this is my 2nd Brindle bed). Summary: If the bed is maintained properly (outer cover washed and inner mattress wiped down), it will last quite a while and stay in good condition. I’ve had the previous bed for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Mold on foam
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved the bed, and so did I at first. It has a nice clean and sleek look, and it was obvious my dog thought it was comfortable. Upon the first wash, I took the cover off and I saw mold spots on the foam under the “waterproof liner”. I was so disgusted and upset as this bed was $70! I should have trusted the reviews from people who have had this same issue. One of my beds was fine, the larger one had this issue. Hopefully the company reaches out and makes this right, as 3 months is not a long time to have this bed.
customer_reviews.author: kristine perez

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!!
customer_reviews.text: This pet bed is the highest quality bed I have ever come across. I was very impressed. The memory foam seems to be high quality which is what my English Bulldog needs. When I went to clean the cover for the first time though I noticed a few tiny holes in it. I instantly emailed the company and within a few days they were quick to generously send a new cover. I just had to show proof of my purchase and pictures of the holes. I highly recommend this bed for the quality of the memory foam and this company as if you do come into a problem their customer service was amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome! It is really thick and looks very comfy for the dog. Also yesterday my puppy peed right on the bed. I was pleased to see that while the cover was soaked in urine, the bed itself is incapsulated in a water proof non removable cover. So, I machine washed the removable cover and wiped clean the bed itself with antibacterial wipes. It dried and is like new. I definitely recommend this bed! Although I will caution, my dog is 13lbs and already is almost too big for this bed. So for dogs 15+ lbs I'd strongly recommend to purchase medium.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur-de-lis

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one in 2015 and I have only now needed to replace it. The original was wonderful. The bed I just ordered is not the same quality at all. Cover is ok but the pad is NOT memory foam like the first. I'm keeping it but won't order another. VERY disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: cdk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for our large dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a 75+lbs German Shepherd mix. The large size bed fits him perfectly. The only minor issue is he runs hot. So he sleeps on the wood floors in the summer and his new bed or our bed in the colder seasons. Our dog had his first accident on the bed...easy to unzip and it is about to go into the washing machine. So far...we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sutter

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this item 3.5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed for my 55 lb golden retriever for about a year and a half now and it has held up beautifully. He sleeps on it every night. I have been able to wash the cover a few times when needed with no problem at all. My only complaint is that the cover to the bed recently ripped right in the middle of the top. I have searched all over amazon and unfortunately there is no way to just replace the cover. I will have to purchase and entirely new bed. I would gladly give 5 stars if the company sold replacement covers.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love these beds!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these beds. One of mine has hip dysplasia and this bed makes her comfortable. They expanded to full description in no time and appear to be high quality. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed due to the fact that it is advertised as waterproof but it is not. My dog wet this bed and it soaked right through to the foam and is ruined. I contacted Brindle via their website regarding their 3 year warranty in the hope of a refund or replacement bed (I purchased the bed 4 months ago) but have not received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: jumped right on this bed & looks so comfortable & contented
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 yr. old Chihuahua, who had knee surgery, jumped right on this bed & looks so comfortable & contented. It's a good thing we bought 2 beds as our 3 yr. old Min Pin just loves sleeping on hers. This is a great quality product & we highly recommend it to anyone who has a dog, young or old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I have been looking for my Senior Dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a real memory foam pad for my senior dog for awhile and have realized that a lot of companies say they have memory foam pads and then end up sending you a skimpy and bumpy mattress topper. WELL, this is NOT one of those, this is actually memory foam and it provides a ton of support for my 14yr old chihuahua who has a bad hip/knee. It also fits perfectly in the MidWest 1524 iCrate Single Door Pet Crate. Would definitely recommend and the price is also great for the quality you receive. Here is the link to the Pet Crate that fits this memory foam pad-
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Hated it from the day we got it for our senior dog. She had an accident that night and the urine leaked right through the "waterproof" barrier. Just like other reviewers have described, the foam began to mold after only a few weeks of use. Also, the 4 inches makes this uncomfortable for our dog in her crate because her head hits the top of the crate. It would have been nice if the seller had mentioned that this should be considered for a dog's height. I cannot understand why this has positive reviews at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November 2019 and it didn't even last a year. July 2020 I took the cover off to wash. The foam mattress pad has a very thin white covering that is suppose to make it waterproof where nothing leaks through. This white protector does nothing.....it has sewn corners and liquids can seep through these small thread holes. I noticed a black mold circle on the bottom inside of the mattress pad. Wish I would of got a picture before throwing in the burn pit. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Material not durable
customer_reviews.text: We had this dog bed less than 24 hours and it was destroyed. The material appears to have torn easily. I feel like had I read that others have had this issue, I might have gone another route. Hopefully, I can save someone who has a dog who likes to dig or burrow $50. I'm sure this is a great product for other people's dogs. It seemed comfy enough. We contacted Linen Spa with our concerns about the material, and they quickly offered us options to guarantee our satisfaction. Five stars for customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Replacing same dog bed purchased ----- 5 years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Second time to purchase this exact bed. The first one last 5 years of daily used from a 70+lb dog. Still looked brand new, especially the actual foam. Cleaning of cover material was simple, just take off and throw in the washing machine. Only reason for replacing is dog had an accident on the bed and was unable to remove the smell. Very pleased and have recommended this specific bed to numerous friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: A Broussard

customer_reviews.title: There is a super thin lining making this item "waterproof"
customer_reviews.text: The waterproofing layer is not durable! There is a super thin lining making this item "waterproof". I went to wash the cover after a few days of use and noticed the lining was already peeling, and tearing apart making the item no longer waterproof. My dog then spilled her water bowl all over the foam and the item now has an odor and will need to be thrown away after only a month. The cover is still in fantastic condition and washed well (reason for 2 stars), but the durability of this item is not worth the price. I have purchased other items for the same price which were much longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schwirtz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Dog Beds!
customer_reviews.text: They are great for my aging dogs! The fabrics on the outer side are soft and easy to remove and wash in the washing machine. The BEST part is that they put a waterproof casing over the thick memory foam cushion! My sweet old black lab will sometimes wet the bed and now I don't have to worry about urine getting in the cushion! I have a Black Lab and a Golden Retriever mix. I bought the Medium (34x22) bed and now wish I bought the larger bed. They still fit on the beds, but on warmer days when they like to spread out, I can tell they would like some more space.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great dog pad!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to go in my dog's outside insulated dog house that is in a closed in area. I wanted something that was waterproof and would be cool in the summer and warm in the winter. This fit the bill perfectly! He loves it and has never even offered to chew on it. It sits back far enough in his house that it shouldn't get wet unless it is a strong blowing wind, so I haven't taken the cover off yet to wash, but so far, I am beyond pleased with this and so is he!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog bed ever!!! We have two 70 pound dogs and they usually tear up ever bed but they love this bed...I have 3 now...one for outside, one for living room and one for bedroom. They love it! The foam is super supportive and the one that’s been outside looks great even after 3 months outside. The cover comes off and goes back on easily which is rare in dog beds. The cover washed up like new. The best money I’ve ever spent on a dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, my dog Thor likes it too:
customer_reviews.text: After a long hard day of chasing birds, cats and eating anything I find on the ground (including poo), its good to have a nice comfortable bed to lay my sore muscles and aching bones on (while I chew on more bones). If/When I barf or wet fart on it, my Caretakers unzip the cover off and throw it in the washer. Then its good for the next time an accident strikes. Life is good.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality/great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great bed, especially for the money. As described, high quality. You could buy a similar bed at a high end pet store for double the price. I ordered the large for my goldendoodle puppy who is expected to be ~60 lbs. I could have gotten away with a smaller size, but it works! Very happy to have found this brand and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bed for the money. I have a tiny 8 lb. Pekingese that loves this bed. You can't expect dog beds to be "chew proof", so I can't comment on that. The cover of the bed is plush and looks like it will hold up to machine washing. For practical reasons, I always cover my dog beds with a huge, soft towel and wash it weekly. This dog bed looks like it will last for a good 10 years - a good investment for $25!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Le Bonzo

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed we’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Great dog bed! I bought one about two years ago and a second in a smaller size about a year and a half ago. They are still in perfect condition! The covers wash up beautifully and the zippers haven’t broken yet! The mattress is covered in a type of waterproof covering and I noticed today when cleaning the covers that they amazingly DON’T SMELL!! My dog digs at her beds and usually rips the fabric. She hasn’t destroyed these beds yet. Highly recommend, especially for a dog with achy bones. I initially bought the first one because she had acl surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Woods

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . that we've ever bought. We wanted another so I went to my order history. Bought two medium beds in November of '17. They're used daily and the memory foam is as good as the day we got them. The dogs love them, especially the one that's placed in front of the fire place. Fifty bucks may seem a tad pricey but it's back to 'you get what you pay for', a cliche, of course, but a fitting one.
customer_reviews.author: Letter Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 48” crate.
customer_reviews.text: 80lb. male German Shepherd. Absolute perfect fit for the 48 inch crate I purchased from another pet-centric online retailer. He’s not one to chew on beds so I cannot offer any feedback in that regard. But he does love this thing. Makes the time he spends in his crate more pleasant. And I can jam a fully stuffed Kong in the front corners of the crate and this helps hold it in place for him.
customer_reviews.author: efuseakay

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, durable and quite comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is the Benz of floor dog beds. The memory foam is thicker than the foam on my bed and the waterproof cover is soft and comfy. While the dog was taking up the majority of the couch, I decided to hop down to see what all the comfort fuss was about. An hour later I woke up smelling of dog and pulling dog shed from the corner of my eyes. Needless to say, my dog loves the bed and doesn't have any problems going "nite-nite" since we got this beddie.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was very soft and plush on top. The memory foam seems to be very comfortable. I was able to press my hand into and the memory foam and see the marks of my hand, which is good. That’s an easy way to test memory foam. It seemed to cradle my dog in the right spots. He looked comfortable on it. My dog is 50lbs and he had plenty of room on the large. We probably could of gone with a medium but if you want them to be able to stretch out, large. The material is soft and I think could be torn apart if you have a heavy chewer. But seems very durable for normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Ann

customer_reviews.title: The beds are like hard surfaces & the return policy is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this bed is nothing like previous Brindles I have purchased. The bed is like a hard board and my aging dog can’t comfortably sleep on it. He has been having sleeping issues since I purchased it and a month later I realized it was his brand new expensive Brindle bed I bought 2 and since the 30 day return policy is 7 days past I’m stuck with 2 beds. My dog is 87 pounds and there’s just no give to them.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, our senior pup has gone incontinent. At first glance, I thought there could be no way that this bed would be waterproof, but it really is! And it manages this feat without having that notorious sleeping bag texture on the outside. It's soft and comfy, the outer layer is water resistant and machine washable - meaning that liquid simply beads up on the top unless rubbed in. The layer beneath is flat out waterproof. Super easy, super comfy, awesome price-point. I cannot give this product enough stars, as it has really changed my pup's quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching, the best. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Tired of searching for a new bed after your dog bed has failed you once again, Not anymore. I have 4 of these after searching and searching. These are the best. Our bulldog and new puppy haven’t ripped or torn these, though they try. Our bulldog has spay incontinence and is on daily proin but sometimes dribbles. Just unzip, throw the whole cover in the wash then dryer as it soaks anything up in the cover to contain the mess. Then wipe off the waterproof wrapped 4”memory foam cushion. Our dog sheds and it’s nice how easy these are to launder. Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordon Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, keeps its shape and perfect to place our pup.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in June. Love most everything about it. The bed is truly waterproof. Our dog is a chewer, but does not chew his bed so that's not been an issue for us. It's super cozy, and does not lose its shape which I was concerned about. This is perfect. It is super easy to run through the wash which was very impressive. It went on perfectly after washing as well. Overall a great bed. Although I noticed that the seam is coming apart near the zipper and would love to have the cover replaced because of it. That is why I gave a 4 star review.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof smells and stained
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bed, in fact I loved it until our dog had an accident, the accident was thoroughly cleaned within 4 hours and the cover has been washed multiple times. The cover is clean, but the “waterproof” mattress (which we have attempted to clean multiple times) is stained and smells. I have now spent $30 on pet cleaning supplies to clean this bed, but to no avail. I want a new mattress so I can wrap it in a baby crib waterproof mattress pad and then use it that way. The size and comfort are perfect, but the mattress is NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Caysea D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The small is the perfect size for my dog's crate but it never expanded to 4" in fact it expanded unevenly, lower at one end, higher at the other which makes the cover fit loosely and it looks sloppy! Waited over 72 hours for it to expand and it basically stopped expanding after about 2 hours. It has been refunded. I had considered buying a second one to see if it expanded to full size but I am afraid I might receive another dud?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft Yet Firm
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Cavalier King Charles Spaniel who is about to have TPLO surgery to fix his ACL. He is going to have to spend a decent amount of time in his crate during recovery, so I wanted something comfortable for his crate. His other bed is pretty squishy and not as sturdy. This bed is still soft, but it’s firm enough where he can’t lose his balance or get stuck trying to get up. He is already putting himself in his crate so he can lay on it. It arrived rolled up and it almost instantly popped into its true shape and size.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 50lb dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 50lbs rescue dog and this bed is just perfect for her!. It is the exact size of her crate and she sleeps really well on it. We had a squishy type bed that was a bit too big for the crate before this and she was always moving around in the night to get more comfortable. This bed is soft yet gives her the firm support and she does not move all around trying to get comfortable with this. It inflated right up to the full 3 inch thickness within an hour of taking it out of the package. I would highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mason

customer_reviews.title: BEST BED WE HAVE EVER BOUGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 65 lb 13 year old with severe arthritis to put in the living room when he is not able to get up on the sofa on his worst days. He loves it and its super comfortable and very easy to clean. I love the waterproof liner and that after washing the cover it always comes out of the dryer perfect without shrinkage. Just purchased another to replace his other very expensive orthopedic bed we use for travel as his expensive travel bed is not near as comfortable as this one. HANDS DOWN THIS IS THE BEST BED YOU WILL EVER BUY!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to measure kennels and crates for fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a medium and a large for my two fur babies. The large fit my Bassett Mix Kennel perfectly, and gives her the support she needs. The only reason I am giving 4 stars instead of 5, is size options. The medium size did not fit my Cocker Spaniel kennel which was my fault for assuming and not measuring! It was too small and left a good 5 inches of bare space. I have replaced it with the Shredded memory foam, and have relegated this one to his snoozing bed in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Two out of three Shiba Inus love it, but the memory foam mildewed!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this, and it held up externally, but one of our dogs needs some dental work and also has a licking problem, and everything she licks starts to smell. I went to wash the cover of this bed, and there are multiple spots of mildew all over one side of it, under the waterproof cover and the liner underneath, in the foam itself.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simek

customer_reviews.title: Approved by a poodle!
customer_reviews.text: My medium sized dog has not been fond of his bed for quite awhile and is restless at night. These cushions are well made with firm cushioning, they are beautiful, and I love the outer cover which was christened his first night due to tummy problems. I washed the cover and it looked brand new afterward. Because of the waterproof mattress cover, there was no damage at all to the new bed. So he is now enjoying pushing a blankie around in his bed to get it just right. It is great fun to see him enjoy his bed again and relaxing and sleeping soundly. Thanks for making this quality bedding for our fuzzy family.
customer_reviews.author: TrishKeys

customer_reviews.title: I had previously bought a different brand of crate pad to replace his old bed but he did not like it because it was too flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dog bed to replace an egg crate foam crate pad that my small dog had torn up. I had previously bought a different brand of crate pad to replace his old bed but he did not like it because it was too flat. He loved this one though and it is very soft and cushy like a dog sized mattress. It fits perfectly in his crate as well. The gray color is perfect to hide any dirty paw marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Pup ate the zipper pull off
customer_reviews.text: My three month old Australian Shepard ate the zipper pull off in less then one week of owning it. (No way to zip it closed) I called customer service and they were no help saying the zipper is not covered under warranty. So now I was stuck with a bed that couldn’t zip closed. I had to throw it away so my pup wouldn’t eat the cushion padding.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Family

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Our dog used a 32x48” bed. Med sized dog and weighs 50 lbs. loves to rub on her back like a puppy. This foam is very nice and the waterproof cover is perfect, the zip off cover goes over the waterproof liner. I gave 3 stars for chew proof, as a dog can chew just about anything they choose.ours is fine even though our dog chose to chew a 3” section of the border bead. So where’s a will there’s a way. I would def buy this mattress again. The waterproof feature is nice and doesn’t sound plastic-ky.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Four years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these beds! These dog beds do not sink down all the way to the floor like the ones often found at pet stores. When you have dogs that are 80+ pounds, this is very important. It supports them in all the right places while not being so stiff as to be uncomfortable for them. They are soft AND supportive. I say this is a winner for my dogs! They have had these beds for four years now and they still feel and look brand new (it helps that I keep their blankets on top since they love mud).
customer_reviews.author: HobbsGal

customer_reviews.title: Going on 2 years. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Our boxer has had this for almost 2 years and it still looks new. Can be easily unzipped and wash the cover in the washing machine weekly. The zipper has held up well. My dog loves her bed. It has maintained the same level and thickness all this time. This is great quality and we love that the inside is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it . . .
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the medium. I have a german shorthaired pointer, a coonhound mix and a hound mix. I had to return and purchase the large size. They like stretching out. One lives to sleep in a ball. You absolutely cannot see where they have sunk down in the bed. Being that two are eight years old, and one is four years old, why not get the best of both worlds. I especially like that you can buy a replacement cover if one of them decides to be destructive. So far not. I highly recommend the bed. I think the price is fantastic. If I ever have to replace I will be getting the same. You cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to love this but can't -- not waterproof at all.  Mold on the memory foam!!!
customer_reviews.text: Want to love this but can't -- not waterproof at all. Memory foam got mold after a few months and I had washed the outer shell several times. I'm sad b/c my dog loved this bed. She is fully house trained so any moisture that got on the outer shell and inner seal was from water from the park on her coat. This is very sad. I have to discard the whole inner mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Savoie

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought an amazon warehouse version- open box. The box did indeed have a hole in it but the dog mattress was in perfect condition. I was a bit iffy at first buying an open box one, but glad I did! Mattress is soft and puffed right up. Fits perfectly in the crate. Replacing a bark box memory foam mattress with this one. Picked this one over the bark box simply because the size of the mattress was the size of the crate (bark box did not offer this size). I am very happy with this purchase, and so is my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 22" size (small) for my dog's 24" crate. I wedged a small blanket around the back and sides to fill in/bolster the gaps. It is very cushiony and supportive for my 9 lb. mixed breed. Make sure to allow the foam to expand fully before using (I waited 20-30 minutes). I also recommend immediately hand washing the cover in mild detergent to get rid of that distinct chemical smell that often accompanies products "Made In China." You may need to "cover the cover" with a blanket if your dog is a chewer. Mine liked to gnaw on the fake fur as well as "scruff" it with his paws.
customer_reviews.author: Stormee

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs prefer these beds to ours!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these that we use in our dogs' kennels...they LOVE them. They both sneak off to take naps in their kennel instead of hanging out on the couch! My dogs are middle age, but one has always had a bit of a bum hip that has kept her from being able to sleep for an extended time without getting up and moving around, but since we got these beds she hardly moves around when she sleeps anymore; I can tell she is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ProfessorM.

customer_reviews.title: The best dog bed I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this bed. It's so easy to get the cover off and back on which is actually rare for most dog beds. The cover didn't shrink in the wash. AND it's waterproof which is a lifesaver. We've had ours for a little more than 3 months and the foam is holding up really well considering 2, 60lb dogs sleep on it every night. I'd order another one, but my pups insist on sleeping together anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Small is too small for a pug
customer_reviews.text: Misleading small sized picture with a Boston Terrier. My poor pug was trying to balance on the small size. There is no way she'd be able to lounge on it. I am sending it back for a medium because the pad is actually very comfortable. Had to give 3 stars due to misleading picture. See my picture.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our old girl who recently passed away. I was glad to know that she was very comfortable before she left us. She would take herself to bed before we did and go to her kennel to lay on her comfortable bed. Had to wash the cover once because of an accident and it completely protected the mattress. Our girl Grace has since passed on and willed her comfortable mattress to her friend and neighbor Jazzy, who I understand is just as happy and comfortable as her good friend was
customer_reviews.author: Kaylis

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely dog approved
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pit/Mastiff mix and a boxer. We are now trusting the 2 year old boxer not to chew up beds, and this one is perfect. There's no tempting cording, piping, or edging to chew up which is great. They have a 48/30" kennel and it fills the kennel nicely. The foam cushioning is wonderful and is outlasting my 2 year old's need to destroy beds. They seem to love the comfort of the 4" foam and it doesn't slide around. I love that the cover comes off for easy washing. Overall, I'd buy this bed over and over again. It's my dog approved and they actually prefer it to the other fluff pillow beds that they have.
customer_reviews.author: computerwizard

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed. Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I received this dog bed one day after placing my order, eventhough I did not upgrade my shipping options. All around, the bed is of superb quality. I and my yorkie couldn't be more satisfied. She turned 11 y/o this week and has patellar luxation, that recently worsened and she was beginning to show signs of serious discomfort. She adapted to this bed immediately and everything looks good so far. This bed was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: No replacement covers for this bed. Had I known this would not have purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pet bed previous to finally getting our new puppy. I am so disappointed at the fact that I can’t buy a replacement cover. We had left our new puppy in her crate and out of anxiety she dug a hole in the top. So I guess the company is okay with not providing replacement covers for purchase. So I guess I will throw it out and be sure to check before I buy another that they can and will be selling replacement covers.
customer_reviews.author: L Little

customer_reviews.title: 95lbs dog after 2 months still like new !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 95+(Probably closer to 105 but don’t tell her) lab mastiff and I wasn’t sure if the bed would hold up. But we are going on 2 months and not even a little dip. The outside material is a little stretched but nothing a good wash wouldn’t fix. We’ve just been vacuuming it and it’s been perfect. Going to get another one for the patio during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Not a substantial cover
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed 5 days. I used it and placed a smaller bed on top of it since the smaller bed has a 1/2 inch base and this would give my dog some comfort. The second night he chewed off the label (you can see the label in the mfg.'s photo above and made a hole (see photo below). This fabric is very light and while soft, it does not appear to be a durable cover. I will contact the mfg. and see if they have a heavier cover, if not I will return. The bed has a very solid and good base to prevent sliding. I wish the cover was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Farley Pendergas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured and stated.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it in the mail. Puffed up almost immediately (probably due to sitting in the sun on the porch). Materials are nice, soft. Seems like a good deal for the price. My 80lb pit-wolfhound mix loves it, hopped right on the second I got it out of the wrapper and hasn't got up yet. My biggest concern was her stuffing bed going flat over time and not cushioning her joints. This seems like it should be perfect. Especially with her sore paws after rock climbing 2 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Best orthopedic bed we have tried!
customer_reviews.text: I've order 4-5 orthopedic dog beds that caused my dog more pain using them than not. This one does have 2 inches of memory foam on top which makes it comfortable for my dog with arthritis. She weighs 26 pounds and the 4 inch thickness prevents her from resting on and firm surface. It fits perfectly inside her crate. She can sleep on it all night and come off of it without limping. So far the best bed for the price. It does also seem to be waterproof, have not actually tested that feature. We love this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Super Service
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived amazingly fast and it is super. It is indeed all of four inches thick so there is no fear my dog's weight will compress it to the ground. It provides great support for him and looks very smart in my apartment. This is a great product and this was an exemplary purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Saenz

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for a large crate and so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: my dog (a Labrador) gets a full nights sleep with this mattress. We have taught him to sleep in his crate and this size (medium) makes a perfect fit inside of the crate. Dog moves around less during the night and he sprawls out completely across the length of the crate. My only wish is that the cover was a bit heavier and tougher. The dog has not yet tried to bite or rip it, but the fabric would easily tear if heavily stressed..
customer_reviews.author: B. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best beds I’ve ever purchased from amazon. I’m tempted to replace all of the dog beds we have around the house with these. For the price ($42 each), I wasn’t expecting to be blown away. But these beds are super thick and the foam is actually really supportive. Other “memory foam” beds I’ve bought flatten immediately when you put pressure on them - can’t be too comfy for my dogs - but these really hold up. My dogs love these beds!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hershey

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this dog bed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dog bed Oct. 23, 2018. Our retriever loves it. She looks very comfortable and happy sleeping or just hanging out on it. I’m glad it has the waterproof cover, because there have been a couple of accidents which were easily handled by washing the outer cover, which is easy to remove and replace. Just wipe off the waterproof cover. After a number of washings, the outer cover still looks like new. It’s attractive and very soft. The bed is soft enough, but firm enough for good support. Our dog, Sammy, weighs 80 lbs. I recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.  Firm and soft enough to stand up to daily use
customer_reviews.text: The Brindle Memory Foam Orthopedic Bed was just what Sky - our mutt female dog needed for her hip dysplasia. What I notice with this particular mattress is that it is soft and yet solid enough for her to get in position to rest and rise easily without fighting a bunch of internal stuffing like many mattresses have. We still have one that she is transitioning from and there is no comparison. Thanks Amazon. Doug W.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet dreams for pooch!
customer_reviews.text: This bed IS memory foam. It gets harder with colder air and softer with warmer air. My dog sleeps like a baby on it. She is 13 and full of arthritis. She also has night accidents. I read the reviews about the mattress undercover not really being waterproof. So I came up with a solution! If you put a crib waterproof mattress pad between the mattress cover and the top cover it works like a gem! If there is an accident all you need to do is wash the pad and top cover together. Amazon sells the crib waterproof pad too. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: JHob

customer_reviews.title: Great bed the dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: A review of. Our dog loves this! Fits the kennel exactly without bunching or being short. Gives our dog the full space to stretch out into and relax without clumps or lumps. Has been holding its shape very well. There's no foam odor and the wooly cover doesn't seem to make our dog hot. Our dog is mid sized but the foam foundation layer supports the weight and doesn't press down to the floor like some beds. We keep the kennel door open and our dog is able to come and go throughout the day and night; the bed is the preferred sleeping spot.
customer_reviews.author: JAZ_5th5

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. More on the firm side - not fluffy like a stuffed dog pillow. Dogs absolutely love sleeping on it, especially my older dog who seems to not limp anymore when she 1st gets out if her bed. Easy to remove cover for laundering and to put back on mattress. Defintely NOT anywhere close to being chew proof given my puppy ate a hole in it (cover and mattress), but product still works fine - we just flipped it over on the other side & set additional dog pillow on top to deter additional chewing and for extra softness/ comfort.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves her bed!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is so soft and yet firm enough to be comfortable to our standard poodle. I put it in her kennel last night and when she went in, she just collapsed on it and hardly moved all night. Also, the bed was delivered in the time it said it would be. I'd buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great support & Easy Care!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yo. Labrador Retriever likes it. She has had TPLO Surgery (plates in knees) on both of her back legs, Therefore, it is imperative she have a supportive, comfortable bed. The Brindle bed fit her needs. This bed is every bit as good as her other bed, purchased from a high end, well known store, but Brindle bed is far less money. The cover is easy to remove & washes well. It doesn’t seem to get as “smelly” between washings as her other bed. I would certainly recommend & purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SoGaYankee

customer_reviews.title: Well designed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a super smart design. A regular foam mattress- covered in a waterproof plastic like cover and THEN the zipper on soft cover over that. Our issue is not chewing, if chewing is your issue this probably isn’t for you. Our issue is we have a dog hating cat who likes to sneak in and pee on the dog bed. With this clean up is sooo easy and the bed isn’t ruined. Very smart design - wishes I’d found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Angemama5

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice though probably more water resistant than truly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I really like look of this bed but my dogs don't seem to like it. I think it is too firm for their preferences because they seem to like more pillowy types of bedding. I have a young dog and an elderly dog that are both prone to accidents so I purchased this primarily for the waterproof inner layer. After a few minor accidents, I'm not so sure that the waterproof layer actually works. I ended up purchasing a waterproof mattress padand either wrap the bed in it and stuff it back into the velour cover or just wrap the bed and leave it as is. The mattress pad has been perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bed For The Price
customer_reviews.text: My 50 pound puppy loves this bed. Unlike most items he has not chewed it up. The covering is tightly fitted and this probably is the reason he has not been able to do any damage. The bed is heavier than anticipated. This is a good thing as the grippers on the bottom and the weight keep it in place. The bed is quite large and should be sufficient for him as he grows. Compared to other beds I have had this one is a great quality and size for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it and price is amazing my puppy falls right to sleep
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves her bed it's good for her spine and her hips it's a little difficult to clean though I try to scrub it when she has a problem and throws up and I use a little scrub brush and a little cleaner that eco-friendly and is very hard to clean and obviously I can't throw it in the washer other than that it's a fantastic mattress and it fits exactly perfect to her cage she passes out real quick when it's bedtime
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Gass

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is definitely not waterproof. Our Maltese puppy had a small accident while resting on the pad. Unfortunately, the moisture penetrated the waterproof liner that is not removable. The waterproof liner had to be cut to be removed and washed. The memory foam soaked up the urin. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelmom1749

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dog Bed with Easy to Wash/Replace Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these beds (2 lg and 1 md) and they are incredibly soft memory foam and haven’t lost shape after 5 yrs. I like that the waterproof cover which has come in handy when dogs have an accident, and it’s kept the foam clean and in good shape. Love the L-shaped zipper which makes the cover easy to remove and clean. I don’t think there’s a dog bed that is indestructible but at least these haven’t been completely destroyed by my terrier. She has ripped open the zipper and chewed the cover on 2 occasions (and mildly ripped apart the foam), but I also love that it’s relatively inexpensive to buy new, replacement covers.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M. Calilung

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice quality dog bed. I bought this for a very old 18 lb. dog who is slowly getting thinner. It's so much better than any other dog bed I have. It fits perfectly in a crate and now Mrs. Dog does not want to get up some mornings! Some reviews complained that the bed did not expand after being tightly rolled up during delivery. I had absolutely no problem and didn't wait to put it in the crate. My dog is on the small side, but it hasn't packed down at all. The bed provides good support and doesn't sag. The washable cover is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: lefsesmom

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I’ve had it for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve had it for over a year now and it’s still like brand new, even with 2 boxers sleeping on it. The cover did “shed” fuzz for awhile but after the first wash, it hasn’t been a problem at all. I’m pleased with the quality. Update: I would still absolutely recommend buying this best, it has held up amazingly(It’s been well used for over a year) and I will definitely buy it again if it ever wears out. However, I had to remove a star because it is NOT waterproof at all. Still a great bed, but it’s not waterproof as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Supportive but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft cover and supportive foam mattress...bought this for my dog’s crate and it fit perfectly. My dog also enjoyed lying on it, however after the second or third use I noticed the cover had several holes in it, presumably from my dog’s claws. The chenille cover is very soft but apparently not durable. My dog has had several material type crate liners but none that have been damaged by her claws. I did send an email to the manufacturer and received no response at all (it’s been over 2 weeks at this point). If I hear back, I’ll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy C.

customer_reviews.title: GSD Tested and Approved
customer_reviews.text: Love these beds for my German Shepherds. They fit perfectly in their crates and so far they love them. They haven’t chewed them up but then again, I give them separate chew toys so they don’t. Firm enough to support their weights. Mine are 85-90lb dogs. Would love to see the ability to buy replacement covers so you can have one on as you wash the other.
customer_reviews.author: Otter1

customer_reviews.title: Washable and have stood the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: These are great dog beds. I purchased two of these beds 9 months ago for an elderly Lab and a young spayed Boxer with incontinence. I have washed the covers to these beds at least once a week since that time, more when my Boxer has an "accident". They have held up remarkably well. I love the removable covers that are washable and the mattress is encased in a liner that prevents the foam from soaking up the urine. They are available in standard sizes to fit your dogs kennel.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not resistant to a kenneled dog.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. Seemed well made. The dog liked it. He demonstrated that by going into his kennel on his own and remaining there for a long nap. Then the next day while he was locked in the kennel... he shredded the bed.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed we've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these beds for my two elderly large dogs (80-100 pounds) and they love them. The size is perfect for them and yet compact enough that they aren't in the way. Beds are well made, look good and have retained their shape over the few months they have used them. I would recommend them to everyone that has a arthritic pet!
customer_reviews.author: Deerwachr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like great quality. It sits a little higher in the crate and that freaks my little dog out. So she will not get in her bed anymore. However, I bought her a new food bowl and she won't eat out of that either. She does not like change. But the bed is really nice. I wish I could get her to use it, because she is getting older and I think she would like it. Crazy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Daisy the dog loves it. She has vacated our couch and stopped hopping up on beds! Wasn't sure how much it would inflate when I took it out of package but we gave it a full day and it's great. The dog scratches around on it pretty harshly before she lays down bit there aren't any signs of wear. I just wish they made one the size of out crate. We got the large with is just a few inches smaller but the next size up wouldn't have fit.
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Cover is thin but bed is good.
customer_reviews.text: My dog ripped this day 1. Do not get if your dog does any digging, even light to shuffle blankets around. The cover shredded from him doing this. Disappointed because it’s a great size, easy care, waterproof lined, and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Good bed- not so good cover
customer_reviews.text: The dog bed itself is really nice, my dogs like it a lot- it’s exactly what we were looking for. I looked at the instructions for washing the cover (I love that it’s removable/washable) and just washed it for the first time (we’ve had it a couple weeks now)...all the soft fluffy stuff on the top of the bed cover cake off and stuck to the rest of the laundry and my washing machine and the cover is basically useless now. I looked to see if I could contact the seller directly to hopefully resolve the issue but couldn’t find a space to do that so figured I’d let others know to be aware of this.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bed is so comfy and big that it fits my my German Shepard dog perfectly, he even has room for the cat or my son to come cuddle too. The material is very soft and the red design looks really nice as well. I have been very impressed with the product so far. The second we took it out of the box our dog laid straight on it, it only took a few minutes to puff up to its full size. Glad I made this purchase and your dog will love how the bed is so soft and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this bed has such high reviews. Yes, it has a good memory foam pad. But the cover is already ripped (not chewed). The cover is very cheaply made. I tried to find a replacement cover and they are either to big or to small. Again, so disappointed that I purchased this bed. I am on a fixed income, so this bed was a major purchase for me. Please be aware of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog with joint problems
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 lab-mixes. One has joint trouble. This bed has been great for both dogs, and they are happy to use them instead of the couch. They are still supportive after 3+ years of use. Also, a standard, elasticized baby crib sheet fits the 28"x48" dog bed, helping to keep the beds cleaner and free-er of dog stink.
customer_reviews.author: -MV

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, very happy. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new bed and purchased this at same time for my big dog. Had to buy smalls for my little dogs (keepin em off my new bed!) and didn't want to hurt the big guy's feelings so purchased this slightly nicer, more supportive one for him. Sweeet. Very nice firm bed for my slightly older dog's old bones. Appears comfortable and well made. Attractive....well, you know, for a dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: Staci L Bemis

customer_reviews.title: This bed and this crate = perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love that the foam has a waterproof cover to protect the foam. ( I have already proven it is waterproof ) Cover is high quality and well made. It fits perfectly inside this crate in the small size. It fits like it was made for it. I have a 15 lb dachshund who had back surgery and he must be confined to crate rest. He has a much larger crate but I use this one to roll around the house during the day so he can always be by my side. This way is happy in the crate. This bed is perfect for this crate. Also the wheels can be locked.
customer_reviews.author: Anne MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice bed but their sizing is way off. My poor pup is 45lbs so I bought her the medium which they recommend for 65lbs and up. It was like the clown car of dog beds. I wanted to return it for a large, but $75 vs $45 for a few more inches seems like a rip off to me. I'm currently looking for something else to comfortably fit my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Beds!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a while reviewing many dogs beds and finally settled on this one. I have two labs, one is 75lbs and the other is 55lbs. I ordered the XL and they are perfect for the both of them. I have had the beds for a few months now and they still look brand new. No sagging and the cover is still great. Incredibly easy to take the cover off and wash it. I am all about making things easy. I will definitely be buying again when the time comes!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Robbennolt

customer_reviews.title: Not puppy proof
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice comfy bed but as far as waterproof, it does not work. I ordered a bed for my puppy in Jan 2019. Our puppy is 11 months now so he does have a couple of accidents here and there in his crate. The bed for 1 does not sell extra covers so you are stuck with what you got. After 6 months of having the bed, the “waterproof” mattress has started absorbing our puppy’s accidents so we were finally forced to through the whole thing in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Best bed in the world
customer_reviews.text: Best bed on the Market. I bought this this year back at the beginning of the year and my dog moves the bed all over the house by using his mouth to pull it wherever he chooses to go. Cover comes off easily and is washable! The memory foam is in a non removable waterproof cover. I need to reach this company cause I took the cover and washed it with no problems but when i was zipping it back up the Zipper broke. Can the company reach out to me please. Thank you! Dunn4911@roadrunner.com
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Dunn

product_meta.title: Brindle Waterproof Designer Memory Foam Pet Bed
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof encasement beneath the fabric cover protects bed against accidents and fluids
4 inch thick bed features 2 inches of comfort memory foam and 2 inches of high-density support foam
Soft, supportive consistency conforms to weight and pressure to relieve achy joints, arthritis and hip dysplasia
Super soft, zippered velour cover resists dirt and hair and is easily removeable and machine washable
Naturally hypoallergenic and resistant to dust mites, plus 3-year warranty - Small size: 22" x 16" x 4"; Ideal for dogs under 25 lbs.
